name: mimacharts
description: a minimal vanilla javascript library to provide extendable material design charts

scripts.build: uglifyjs mimaCharts.js -c -m -o dist/mimaCharts.min.js; gzip < dist/mimaCharts.min.js > dist/mimaCharts.min.js.gz; stat --printf="%s" dist/mimaCharts.min.js.gz; echo " bytes"
